name: Shannon Hopkins
comment: Great drone with many advanced features. I had purchased the drone from this website and had fun using it

name: Mr Tim
comment: Best product from Mavic, Loved it! Recommended to buy. I have captured a lot of natural travelling videos.

name: Patt Nicola
comment: This drone is awesome. I have never flown anything in the sky before and was extremely nervous before the first flight!

name: Caroline Chapman
comment: Heard so many great things and have watched friends fly this drone and it is amazing!

name: Mr Travis
comment: I don't even know where to start. This thing is amazing!

name: Mr Michael
comment: I purchased this as my travel drone that would be easy to take with me on trips or for quick shoots.
